statements: DELETE FROM BillingCalculations WHERE energy_consumed > 100 AND tariff_rate < 0.15;
DELETE FROM BillingCalculations WHERE customer_id = 123 AND energy_consumed > 100
DELETE FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumer_id = 100 AND consumption_amount > 500.0;
DELETE FROM tariff_rates WHERE tariff_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND end_date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM TariffRates WHERE rate > 0.1 AND energy_type = 'Electricity';
DELETE FROM payments WHERE customer_id = 500 AND payment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM billing_records WHERE customer_id = 100 AND total_cost > 500;
